strings.Value: "Why do people write everything down? Memory is firmer than paper."

"You can't borrow someone else's memory and read it in a library! Besides, memories die with their owners, while books keep living... Well, maybe not forever, but definitely longer than their authors!"
"I find peace in it. Remembering the beauty of a moment is one thing, but describing it in a way that will bring it to life years later â€” that's something different."
"Most honorable Ekundayo, you used to guard caravans. Do you think your employer's business would have thrived if he only did his accounting in memory, not on paper?"
